title: “Melania’s Last Christmas” (Holiday mailbag!)
description: Jon F. and Dan answer your questions on the Senate majority, redistricting, what they hate about Twitter and like about Taylor Swift’s new albums.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
